channel.title: CVE Feed for AbemaTV, Inc. -- 'ABEMA' App for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AbemaTV, Inc. -- 'ABEMA' App for Android

item.title: CVE-2024-28745|2024-03-18T03:18:21.948Z -- AbemaTV, Inc. -- 'ABEMA' App for Android
item.description: Improper export of Android application components issue exists in 'ABEMA' App for Android prior to 10.65.0 allowing another app installed on the user's device to access an arbitrary URL on 'ABEMA' App for Android via Intent. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary website may be displayed on the app, and as a result, the user may become a victim of a phishing attack.
